item.title: Heartbreak
item.description: I feel wistful because she sidelined me. But also, I am trusting that she return to me. I start singing. I’m lying alone with my head on the phone Thinking of her till it hurts I know she hurt too but what else can we do? Tormented and torn apart I wish I could carry her smile in my heart For times when my life seems so low It would make me believe what tomorrow could bring
